trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_MemberTypes" name="MemberTypes" href=""> </xref> objeto que indica o tipo de membro para procurar.

trans-unit.source: A bitmask comprised of one or more <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"></xref> that specify how the search is conducted.
trans-unit.target: Uma máscara de bits composta por um ou mais <xref href="System.Reflection.BindingFlags"> </xref> que especificam a forma como a procura é efetuada.

trans-unit.source: -or- Zero, to return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: - ou - Zero, devolver <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The delegate that does the comparisons, returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the member currently being inspected matches the `filterCriteria` and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que suporta comparações, devolvendo <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o membro atualmente a ser inspecionado corresponde a `filterCriteria` e <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> caso contrário.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterAttribute" name="FilterAttribute" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterName" name="FilterName" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterNameIgnoreCase" name="FilterNameIgnoreCase" href=""></xref> delegates supplied by this class.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterAttribute" name="FilterAttribute" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterName" name="FilterName" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterNameIgnoreCase" name="FilterNameIgnoreCase" href=""> </xref> delegados fornecidos por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: The first uses the fields of <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldAttributes" name="FieldAttributes" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodAttributes" name="MethodAttributes" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodImplAttributes" name="MethodImplAttributes" href=""></xref> as search criteria, and the other two delegates use <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> objects as the search criteria.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro utiliza os campos de <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldAttributes" name="FieldAttributes" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodAttributes" name="MethodAttributes" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodImplAttributes" name="MethodImplAttributes" href=""> </xref> como os critérios de pesquisa e utilizam os delegados outros dois <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> objetos, como os critérios de pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The search criteria that determines whether a member is returned in the array of <xref uid="langword_csharp_MemberInfo" name="MemberInfo" href=""></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Os critérios de pesquisa que determina se um membro é devolvido na matriz de <xref uid="langword_csharp_MemberInfo" name="MemberInfo" href=""> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The fields of <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldAttributes" name="FieldAttributes" href=""></xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodAttributes" name="MethodAttributes" href=""></xref>, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodImplAttributes" name="MethodImplAttributes" href=""></xref> can be used in conjunction with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterAttribute" name="FilterAttribute" href=""></xref> delegate supplied by this class.
trans-unit.target: Os campos de <xref uid="langword_csharp_FieldAttributes" name="FieldAttributes" href=""> </xref>, <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodAttributes" name="MethodAttributes" href=""> </xref>, e <xref uid="langword_csharp_MethodImplAttributes" name="MethodImplAttributes" href=""> </xref> podem ser utilizadas em conjunto com o <xref uid="langword_csharp_FilterAttribute" name="FilterAttribute" href=""> </xref> delegado fornecido por esta classe.

trans-unit.source: A filtered array of <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo> objects of the specified member type.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de filtrado de <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>objetos do tipo de membro especificado.</xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo>

trans-unit.source: -or- An empty array of type , if the current does not have members of type memberType that match the filter criteria.
